page.title: 06ULLAPOOL FAMILIES.
page.content:
ANDREW - On a Saturday I help my Dad with the sheep and the croft.
RUTH- After breakfast we feed our 9 goats,2 cats,20 rabbits,2 pigs and 100 hens.Then we check the sheep.
SUSAN - I have to get up at 8.30 because my Mam has to go to work at 9
JANICE - In the afternoon, I help in the house and practise my bagpipes.
ALEC - I put a blanket over my window at night because it is too light to get to sleep.
MALCOLM - On Saturday I get up at 09.30 in time for the television.
SHARON - At the weekend,we sometimes go to Inverness for the day.
